mapper.select: select m.mem_no, m.mem_nm, m.mem_email, m.mem_date, m.mem_age, m.mem_exdate, m.mem_gndr, j.job_nm, m.mem_lvl from member m join job j on(m.mem_job = j.job_no)

select * from( select rownum rnum ,a.* from (select m.mem_no, m.mem_nm, m.mem_email, m.mem_date, m.mem_age, m.mem_exdate, m.mem_gndr, j.job_nm, m.mem_lvl from member m join job j on(m.mem_job = j.job_no) order by mem_nm) a) where rnum between #{page}*#{pageSize}-(#{pageSize}-1) and #{page}*#{pageSize}
